snippet.title: while True: learn() Trailer: Story Mode, New Features, Machine Learning Awesomeness
snippet.description:
Read the story behind the game (3 minutes): https://blog.luden.io/meet-while-true-learn-a7343bf5e27a
All platforms: https://luden.io/wtl

You’re a machine learning specialist who makes neural networks but your cat seems to be better at it. Now you must solve puzzles to build a cat-to-human translation device (who knows what else this cat is capable of!). Earn a fortune, buy kickass cat outfits and learn how machine learning really works!

https://luden.io/wtl/
